reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress cute, comfortable, and stretchy, with a flattering fit that hugs curves well. The material receives mixed feedback - while some praise its thick cotton feel, others note it's very thin. Customers appreciate that it's not see-through and true to size, though some mention it runs small. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent buy for my short height and fits & feels smooth
items.body: Great fit! Got it for its comfy look to walk around in even at home and itâ€™s really nice and soft. It is thin material, but not so much that itâ€™s see through and hugs my curves in all the right spots. I had to crumple it a little throughout my body because of the length of it, but itâ€™s totally not bad as a 5â€™1 155lbs short woman. It went overhead nicely and I didnâ€™t struggle to take it off either, the only tight part on me that felt like I couldâ€™ve used more room were on the armpits area, but aside from that itâ€™s perfect. I love its cotton feel and color, made me feel great. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars FITS PERFECTLY
items.body: GORGEOUS!! The size is accurate, and the fit is very nice (not see through) I ordered the blue and itâ€™s almost like a periwinkle. I weight 100, and Iâ€™m 5â€™4ft Fits perfect and I canâ€™t wait to buy more colors Read more
items.author: Madison

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutly must buy!
items.body: As a petite,5â€™2, short, skinny person (can never find anything in her size girly). I TOTALLY 100% recommend. I ordered a XS the sizing was impeccable. Hugs you in all the right places. Super flattering and cute. In terms of sheerness I would definitely recommend the stickies to cover your chest or a bra. Read more
items.author: Esther Perez

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Form fitting
items.body: Real cute and fits my form, it came with a stain tho and I havenâ€™t had the chance to wear it out and I didnâ€™t return it in time to get a replacement but itâ€™s really nice just make sure to check it ! Read more
items.author: Jaiye Garrett

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My baby shower dress!
items.body: Great dress for my baby shower!! It was super comfortable, and a decent thickness to wear it wasnâ€™t showing through my maternity shape wear bottoms and I did not even have to bother with a full bra, just wore small pasties (my preference but not needed). Size Small was good fit! I went with a small because Iâ€™m shorter, 5â€™3â€ . Currently Iâ€™m 150lbs with this baby at 32 weeks!!!! Pre-pregnancy size I would have definitely went with an XS (I was 105lbs). So itâ€™s definitely stretchy! Length was great, easy to move and breathe in, loved the deep brown color to match my man & Dino theme. My chest size has increased to almost 38â€ bust and dress complimented and covered nicely. I loved how it was almost a tank top back, I did not feel comfortable with my shoulders and back fully exposed for my event I am pretty pale and been having hormonal acne so I loved the coverage of this dress compared to a spaghetti strap just felt secure and comfy the whole 6 hour event!!! I would recommend:) Read more
items.author: RONDA

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft material petite friendly
items.body: Super cute dress. Slimming effect. Not too long. Read more
items.author: Kimmy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get the dress!
items.body: Love the fit and feel. Itâ€™s stretchy but snug at the same time. Could be a tad bit cheaper price wise. You ca definitely dress it up or down. I have it in green, navy and now red. I need all the other colors at this point! And I see they have it in long sleeve too?! Definitely going to get one or two. Get the dress! Read more
items.author: Queen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love!!!
items.body: I bought this dress for my baby shower and i loved it! super stretchy not restricting at all and so comfy im 5â€™4 and 150 and it fit me and my belly so well. when i got it it surprisingly didnâ€™t come with that weird cheap factory smell lol. was definitely worth the money! Read more
items.author: Izzy

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Brown, Dark Grey, Magenta, Light Green, Black, Star Sapphire, Light Blue, Red, Navy, Purole, Khaki, Lemon Yellow, Amber Yellow. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
